class_notes: This section is for MN + MSN semester 1 students only.
course_description: This course provides students an understanding of pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics, and pharmacogenomics when treating selected illnesses. Emphasis will be on nursing management of drug therapies in patients across the lifespan with application to the clinical setting.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1516, Section #: 400, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TW 10-11:50a, Instructor: Mueller/Balthazar, Status: Closed
